body: Hi Mostapha, I update my library and everything is OK. If I want to add customized materials, constructions and schedules, I can also write them into the OpenStudioMasterTemplate.idf. Is it right? And when I call these schedules, can I connect the name of them directly to the schedule module? Dan [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Tkccsb*3vm56ThfJjkZXjYvCjyJyab4MWmkEbnNx2iKiw9BDm0J-bsHqFLcls8orgEFgQzgk9DslPx2hqxJ4QiuyZxI*efJD/1.PNG)
